Module test_ui1
Package model.ChangebleRole

Class Political<R extends Enum<R>>

java.lang.Object
model.ChangebleRole.Political<R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chancellor, President
public abstract class Political<R extends Enum<R>> extends Object
Class Political designed to controll the right-usagem and work with cards in a hand

    • useRight

      public Object useRight(R rightType, Right.ExecutionStatusWrapper executionResult, Object... parametrs)
      metohd to use the right, not guaranteed to be executed
      Parameters:
      rightType - the type of the right that will be used
      executionResult - changes the objects status parametr towords the right execution status
      parametrs - all the parametrs that right needs
      Returns:
      the result of the right

    • giveCards

      public void giveCards(ArrayList<CardsArray.Card> cards)
      gives cards to political
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards that is given for the political, the cards count has to be the same as cardsCount

    • chooseCardToRemove

      public boolean chooseCardToRemove(Integer card)
      chooses the card that will be removed, if the input is null then removes all cards. After the card removing the cards will desapear from the political
      Parameters:
      card - index of the card that will be removed
      Returns:
      the execution status

      Parameters:
      newRight - right type
      maxUsageCount - the usage count of the right, if -1 then inginite
